mapper.update:
update activity_personnel_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE},

is_review = #{isReview,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update activity_personnel_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_review = #{isReview,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select b.name as activity_name,b.event_location as event_location, a.* from activity_personnel_info as a left join activity_info as b on a.activity_id = b.id where a.open_id = #{parameter.openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
